title: Galway United » David Hurley
snippet: Cork-born attacking midfielder David Hurley joined Galway United in 2020 and has been a key figure ever since. Hurley signed from Cobh Ramblers in November 2020. He was United’s top scorer in 2023 with 21 league goals, helping secure the First Division title.

title: Galway United retain services of David Hurley - The Home of Irish Football - Extratime.com
snippet: Hurley’s re-signing was unveiled this evening after the 25-year-old had a stellar year in 2023. The Corkman won the Galway United Men's Player of the Year and scored 24 goals throughout the season for the Tribesmen. And that helped them win the league convincingly and earn promotion back to the Premier Division. Galway United are delighted to announce that our Player Of The Year, David Hurley has signed back for 2024 READ MORE https://t.co/t9vyAHGzXu SEASON TICKETS https://t.co/MhgHXIswwb#ItsATribalThingpic.twitter.com/jQ3150m1qC — Gaillimh Aontaithe (@GalwayUnitedFC) November 30, 2023
